title: Mastering Power BI Desktop: A Deep Dive into the Pane Switcher
excerpt: On-Object Editing has been out for a bit in Power BI Desktop, and it came with a cool pane switcher! Adam walks through how to use the pane switcher and talks about some recent updates.  Use on-object interaction with visuals in your report (preview) https://learn.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/power-bi-on-object-interaction
